name: .MILK
summary: Learn about .MILK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Nullsoft Winamp with the MilkDrop plug-in

instructions: To use a MILK file with MilkDrop or projectM, you must place the file in the programs' presets folder (or whichever folder you use to store presets). Then, you can select the MILK file as a preset in MilkDrop or projectM.
To use a MILK file with the Windows version of VideoLAN VLC media player:
Click the All button in the Show settings section.
Click the Browse... button next to the projectM preset path field.
Navigate to and select the folder containing your MILK file.
If you want to edit the settings a MILK file contains, you can do so by opening and editing the file in any text editor, such as Microsoft Notepad, Apple TextEdit, or GitHub Atom.
